sub_title: CMO a.i. // Venture builder. Advisor. Investor.
summary:
Open to interim and long term opportunities: Chief Executive Officer, (Co-)Founder, Expansion/Scale-up/Growth Strategist, Non-Executive Board Member and Private (Network) Investor.  

Marijn is Founder, former CEO and Executive Board Member of Chama, a mobile marketplace for instant home delivery (< 20 min) of cooking gas cylinders in Brazil. Up to 50M households in Brazil need cooking gas every 1-3 months. With over 10M downloads, the Chama app makes ordering gas easy and brings price and quality transparency for consumers. For suppliers, the driver app brings growth and improves productivity, which allows gas bottles to be better priced and delivered faster.
 
Before founding Chama, Marijn worked as a strategy consultant at Monitor Deloitte for 10 years,  serving large international clients with Corporate & Business Unit strategy, Customer & Marketing strategy, Market entry, Digital Strategy and Innovation. In this role Marijn build extensive executive consulting experience in primarily manufacturing, energy and resources (incl. offshore construction, T&I), working in countries across Europe, M/S-America and Africa.

Marijn studied Industrial Engineering and Management Science at the Eindhoven University of Technology (MSc). Part of his course was completed at the University of Pretoria, South Africa. He graduated in 2007 with a master thesis in Operations Research and Logistics in support of the TNT Post headquarters in The Hague. In 2012, he successfully completed the CMA program of the American Institute of Management Accountants.

profile_positions.location: São Paulo, Brazil + Amsterdam, The Netherlands
profile_positions.description:
Mobile market place targeting the 400M bottles per year home delivery market of cooking gas in Brazil. Active in the states of Sao Paulo, Belo H, Rio Grande do Sul, Parana, and Santa Catarina.

With over 10M downloads and thousands of connected dealers and drivers, Chama revolutionises the gas delivery market in Brazil and is well under way towards market leadership by "becoming the preferred way for consumers to order their gas". Backed by strategic investor SHV Energy, a leading global player in energy distribution active in over 25 countries, Chama has grown to a headcount of 125+ with offices in Amsterdam and Sao Paulo.

For consumers:
Consumers order using the Chama app and are delivered the bottle of their preferred brand in under 20 minutes at a competitive price. They can track their delivery and pay in-app or upon delivery at the door. 

For drivers and dispatch operators:
Drivers use the Chama driver app to receive orders, for navigation, and to manage their backlog of orders from various channels and sources. Depot and dispatch managers use the Chama webportal to manage their fleet and add conventional phone orders to be delivered through the driver app. 

For shop owners and distributors:
Our solution makes partner dealers from all brands incl. Ultragaz, Liquigas, Supergasbras, Consigaz, Copagaz, Nacional Gas and Servgas grow volumes at increased driver productivity, with customers benefiting from convenience, faster delivery and better prices.

profile_positions.description:
Led multiple high profile client engagements and teams in the fields of corporate strategy, BU strategy, digital strategy and operations. Worked mostly for globally operating clients in energy, manufacturing, construction and consumer industries. 

Selected project experience:
- Corporate strategy for € 8bn revenue European construction company
- Corporate strategy for a € 7bn revenue global leader in off-grid propane distribution
- Corporate strategy and operating model for € 4bn global marine contracting and services group
- Strategy and fleet plan for global leader in midstream terminal towage and services
- Market entry strategy Mexico for European offshore production platform T&I specialist
- Strategy review and organizational alignment for South American National Oil Company
- Strategy for heavy marine transport company focused on oil & gas industry
- Strategy and growth plan for € 1.5bn revenue globally active animal byproducts processor
- Expansion strategy and operating model for African oil & gas marine services provider
- Strategy and operating model for leading shipping and oil & gas ER and salvage company
- Financial modelling and international growth plan for TV content and production house
- Strategy development for the National Lottery in the Netherlands
- Business case for € 1.1bn hostile bid on listed offshore transport company
- Market study renewables and oil & gas decommissioning market North West Europe
- Post merger integration for international maritime contracting and service group
- Strategic business review leading UK based red meat processor and retail packer
- Multiple vendor and acquisition commercial due diligences for PE investors in variety of industries

Started as a business analyst in 2007 and progressed through the ranks of consultant, senior consultant, manager and senior manager as a high performer. Left Deloitte to start Chama at the verge of promotion to Director in the Monitor Deloitte strategy practice in Amsterdam.
